product.title: μCT 100HE Cabinet microCT Scanner
product.summary: Part of SCANCO Medical AG’s high-end cabinet series (μCT50/100/100HE), the μCT 100HE combines an enlarged chamber with ultra-high resolution (up to 0.5/1.25/1.5 μm) and extended energy up to 130 kVp. A 12-position auto-sampler enables batch and unattended operation. Typical applications include ex vivo specimens (bone, teeth, tissue, materials) and various materials for internal structural and mechanical analysis; with contrast agents it supports fine imaging of cardiovascular, urinary and digestive systems in animals. Widely used in orthopedics, dentistry, oncology, regenerative medicine, cardiovascular studies, materials science, geology and paleontology.

type.label: Type
lines: Fully shielded, no external shielding required

xray_source.label: X-ray Source
xray_source.value: Sealed, air-cooled, maintenance-free; 5–40 µm focal spot (4–39 W); 20–130 kVp (preset/calibrated 45/55/70/90/130 kVp)

resolution.label: Resolution
resolution.value: < 5 µm (10% MTF); 1.5–200 µm nominal isotropic voxel size

options.label: Auto-sampler
options.value: Up to 12 sample positions (depending on max sample size)
